description: NY income tax baseline data sources and methodology

primarySources.name: IRS Statistics of Income (SOI) - State Data
primarySources.description: Individual income tax returns by state and income bracket. Provides filer counts and AGI by bracket for NY.

primarySources.name: NYS Department of Taxation and Finance - PIT Statistical Reports
primarySources.description: Personal income tax filer summary datasets. Provides NYS liability by income range.

primarySources.name: NYC Independent Budget Office - Tax Revenue Analysis
primarySources.description: NYC personal income tax analysis, revenue by bracket, and fiscal notes.

primarySources.name: NYS Comptroller - Revenue Reports
primarySources.description: Annual financial reports with tax revenue breakdowns.

methodology.filerCounts: Based on IRS SOI Table 2 for New York State, tax year 2021. Total ~10.4M returns.
methodology.agiByBracket: IRS SOI provides total AGI by income class. Values rounded to nearest $100M.
methodology.nysLiability: Derived from NYS DTF PIT statistics. Cross-referenced with NYS Comptroller total PIT collections ($59.5B for FY2022). Individual bracket splits estimated from effective rate analysis.
methodology.nycLiability: NYC PIT total ~$15.5B (IBO FY2022). Allocated to brackets using effective rate progression. NYC residents are ~42% of state filers but higher share at top incomes.
methodology.nycResidentShare: Estimated from IRS SOI migration data and Census. NYC has ~42% of state population but attracts disproportionate high-income earners. Share increases with income bracket.

revenueConcentration.source: NYS DTF annual reports and IBO analysis

knownLimitations: 2021 tax year may not reflect post-pandemic migration patterns
NYC resident share by bracket is estimated, not directly observed in SOI
Some high-income filers file as pass-throughs; their income appears differently
Joint vs single filer composition varies by bracket and affects effective rates

totalNysPit.note: Cross-check: sum of bracket liabilities should approximate this total

totalNycPit.note: NYC personal income tax collections FY2022
